item.title: MSc Thesis: Deep Natural Language Processing for Radiology Reports
item.description: In recent years deep learning has proven quite successful in the field of natural language processing (NLP). However, many of todayâ€™s NLP models require very large datasets for training, thus self-supervised pre-training (like BERT [1]) on large unlabeled datasets has become quite important.
